Function is also a object, like in JavaScript

no return keyword!

```R
add2 <- function(x, y){
    x + y
}
```

steps of improve function

```R
x <- 1:20
above10 <- function(x){
    use <- x > 10
    x[use]
}
r <- above10(x)
print(r)
```

```R
aboveN <- function(x, n){
    use <- x > n
    x[use]
}
r <- aboveN(x, 10)
print(r)
```

```R
aboveN <- function(x, n=10){
    use <- x > n
    x[use]
}
r <- aboveN(x)
print(r)
```
